title: No broker Fee 2 bedrooms apartment in a luxury building. Financial Dis
posting_body: ['Andrea Cortese', 'Phone: 914-349-1626', 'Mobile: 914-349-1626', 'Fax: 212-227-1120', 'Email: <URL>', 'NO BROKER FEE.', 'This is a 2 Bedrooms apartment located in a Full service Building.', 'Residents have the option to explore 22,000sq/ft of amenities at A R E A | 70 Pine’s newest fitness center which features daily classes, a Pilates and yoga studios, a turf track, a bowling alley, virtual golf, a resident lounge with billiards and ping pong, and screening room in historic bank vault.', 'Available now.', 'Listing ID #: 138282', 'Price: $7,221', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 2.0', 'Building Amenities', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Subway', 'Laundry', 'Bicycle Room', 'Nursery', 'Lounge', 'Valet', 'Wheelchair Access', 'WiFi', 'Receiving Room', 'Business Center', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Walls OK', 'Balcony', 'Terrace', 'Dishwasher', 'Washer', 'Hardwood', 'Renovated', 'Light', 'NO FEE', 'Walk In Closet', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Andrea Cortese', 'Phone: 914-349-1626', 'Mobile: 914-349-1626', 'Fax: 212-227-1120', 'Email: <URL>', 'To view, call or text Andrea Cortese at 914-349-1626 or <URL>']
